item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello This is my first post! I’ve been working on a number of games but finally I was able to focus on a single idea for long enough that it has become more serious. It’s a RTS type of game with a major focus on rolling the dice. No title yet. I will update on more detail in upcoming updates.
